Modelling and Simulation Framework for Neural Networks of Arthropod Compound Eyes

Class Hierarchy
This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
[detail level 12]
CompoundPye.src.Analyzer.analyze_compare.AnalyzeCompareThis class is designed to analyze several simulations, with exact same parameters but stimulus speed
CompoundPye.src.Analyzer.analyzer.AnalyzerClass to analyze data created with MotionDetectorModel
CompoundPye.src.Circuits.circuit.CircuitBasic Circuit class that handles a network of components and sensors and their updating at each time step
CompoundPye.src.Circuits.circuit_array.CircuitSensorArrayCircuit that needs to be initialized with a list of Components (as the basic Circuit object) and an array of Sensors
CompoundPye.src.Components.component.ComponentBasic component class
CompoundPye.src.Components.component.Component2Very similar to the class Component, but with 2 functions in the transfer from input to output
CompoundPye.src.Components.linear_input_filter.LinearInputFilterLinearInputFilter is a Component with a predefined linear transfer function
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.CompWidgetA CompWidget is a graphical representation (just a line of buttons really) of a neuron/component in an 'Editor'-object
CompoundPye.src.Components.Connections.connection.ConnectionBasic connection class, with only 2 variables, self.weight and self.target
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.ConnectionEditA widget that allows the user to choose a target of a connection via an combo-box and set the connection's weight
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.ConnectionEditTangentialCreates a Widget to define parameters of a connection
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.ConnectionWidgetA widget that allows the user to choose targets of connections via combo-boxes and set the connections' weights
CompoundPye.src.GUI.stimuli_editor.DummyWidgetA dummy widget that has an additional member DummyWidget.stimuli in case this is ever required..
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.EditorAn ditor-widget that serves as content of the tabs of 'EditorTabs'-objects
CompoundPye.src.GUI.sensor_editor.EditorScrollAreaThis ScrollArea is the actual editor window in which the user can add/remove sensors and click on a sensor's button to edit its properties
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.EditorTabsThis class is a QTabWidget whose tabs contain two similar editor-widgets, in which the user can build up and edit a circuit of neurons/components
CompoundPye.src.GUI.sensor_editor.EditorWidgetThe main or frame widget of the graphical sensor-editor
CompoundPye.src.Components.highpass_filter.HighpassFilterComponent with a predefined transfer function turning it into a high-pass filter
CompoundPye.src.Components.highpass_filter.HighpassFilter2Similar to HighpassFilter
CompoundPye.src.Components.lowpass_filter.LowpassFilterLowpassFilter is a Component with a predefined transfer function, turning it into a low-pass filter
CompoundPye.src.Components.lowpass_filter.LowpassFilter2Similar to LowpassFilter
CompoundPye.src.GUI.main_gui.Main_GUIMDM_GUI is QtGui.QWidget which serves as frame for all the smaller widgets of the GUI (tabs and editors)
CompoundPye.src.Surroundings.one_dim.OneDimThe basic Surroundings-class to create one dimensional Surroundings-objects, which handles the 'Surroundings of the motion detector'
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.PopupConnectionsA widget in which the user can edit a neuron's connections
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.PopupConnectionsTangentialWidget to edit a tangential cells connections, or rather the connections to this cell
CompoundPye.src.GUI.circuit_editor.PopupNeuronA widget in which the user can specify a neuron's parameters
cp_GUI.RunGUIRunGUI initializes the graphical user interface, which enables the user to set all simulation parameters using this interface
CompoundPye.src.Sensors.sensor.SensorBasic Sensor class
CompoundPye.src.GUI.sensor_editor.SensorLineA line representing a sensor in the editor window (EditorScrollArea), containing a button showing the sensor's label and a remove-button
CompoundPye.src.GUI.sensor_editor.SensorPopupA (pop-up) widget in which the user can edit the properties of a sensor
CompoundPye.src.GUI.stimuli_editor.StimLineA widget representing a stimulus in the graphical editor ('StimuliSubWidget'), consisting of buttons to edit/remove the stimulus
CompoundPye.src.GUI.stimuli_editor.StimPopupA pop-up window allowing the user to edit the current parameters of the stimulus
CompoundPye.src.GUI.stimuli_editor.StimuliSubWidgetA sub-widget shown in the parent StimuliWidget
CompoundPye.src.GUI.stimuli_editor.StimuliWidgetEditor window in which the user can add/remove/edit stimuli
CompoundPye.src.Surroundings.Stimuli.stimulus.StimulusThe basic Stimulus class, which can be used to add a Stimulus to a Surrounding-object
CompoundPye.src.Surroundings.Stimuli.one_dim_box.OneDimBoxOneDimBox is a Stimulus with a predefined box-shape of given length
CompoundPye.src.Surroundings.Stimuli.one_dim_sine.OneDimSineOneDimSine is a Stimulus with a predefined sine-shape of given length
CompoundPye.src.Surroundings.surroundings.SurroundingsThe basic Surroundings-class handles the surroundings of the agent
CompoundPye.src.system.SystemHandles communication between Surrounding- and Circuit-objects
CompoundPye.src.GUI.ui_tabs.TabCircuitA tab (Widget) in which the user can add components and connections between components and specify several circuit-parameters
CompoundPye.src.GUI.ui_tabs.TabOutputA tab (Widget) in which the user can specify the output parameters of the simulation
CompoundPye.src.GUI.ui_tabs.TabSensorsA tab (Widget) in which the user can add sensors and specify several sensor-parameters
CompoundPye.src.GUI.ui_tabs.TabSurroundingsA tab (Widget) in which the user can specify several surroundings-parameters (dimension, size in pixel, etc.)
CompoundPye.src.GUI.ui_tabs.TabSystemA tab (Widget) in which the user can specify several system-parameters
